title: Do US Voters Favour Kamala Harris Or Donald Trump? Exit Polls Say...
content: Americans on Tuesday voted to decide whether Kamala Harris will win the race to the White House or Donald Trump will retain the top post for a second time.
summary: Americans on Tuesday voted to decide whether Kamala Harris will win the race to the White House or Donald Trump will retain the top post for a second time.

title: "Bibi Traitor": Protests In Tel Aviv After Netanyahu Fires Defence Minister
content: Thousands of Israelis rallied in Tel Aviv late Tuesday to protest the sacking of defence minister Yoav Gallant, calling on his successor Israel Katz to prioritise a hostage deal to return the captives still held in Gaza.
summary: Thousands of Israelis rallied in Tel Aviv late Tuesday to protest the sacking of defence minister Yoav Gallant, calling on his successor Israel Katz to prioritise a hostage deal to return the captives still held in Gaza.

title: Trump Leads In 10 States, Projected To Win 101 Electoral Votes, Harris Trails
content: Counting has begun for the US elections and Donald Trump has been announced the winner in the Red states of Indiana and Kentucky and Kamala Harris in the Blue state of Vermont by American networks.
summary: Counting has begun for the US elections and Donald Trump has been announced the winner in the Red states of Indiana and Kentucky and Kamala Harris in the Blue state of Vermont by American networks.

title: Who Is Israel Katz, The New Israeli Defence Minister?
content: Israel Katz, formerly Israel's foreign minister, has been appointed defence minister after Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu sacked Yoav Gallant from the post.
summary: Israel Katz, formerly Israel's foreign minister, has been appointed defence minister after Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu sacked Yoav Gallant from the post.

title: Trump Alleges "Massive Cheating" In Key Swing State Of Pennsylvania
content: Donald Trump sought to undermine Tuesday the credibility of voting in the biggest city of must-win Pennsylvania, a soundly Democratic area that was part of the ex-president's unsupported 2020 fraud claims.
summary: Donald Trump sought to undermine Tuesday the credibility of voting in the biggest city of must-win Pennsylvania, a soundly Democratic area that was part of the ex-president's unsupported 2020 fraud claims.

title: Over 70% Of Voters Not Happy With How Things Are Going In US: Exit Polls
content: The state of democracy, the shape of the economy and abortion are the most important issues for American voters in the US presidential election, according to the first wave of exit polls.
summary: The state of democracy, the shape of the economy and abortion are the most important issues for American voters in the US presidential election, according to the first wave of exit polls.

title: Elon Musk Is Sued Over $1 Million Election Giveaway
content: Elon Musk was sued in a proposed class action on Tuesday by registered voters who signed his petition to support the Constitution for a chance to win his $1 million-a-day giveaway, and now claim it was a fraud.
summary: Elon Musk was sued in a proposed class action on Tuesday by registered voters who signed his petition to support the Constitution for a chance to win his $1 million-a-day giveaway, and now claim it was a fraud.

title: Most US Voters Believe Democracy Is Under Threat: Exit Polls
content: Nearly three-quarters of voters in Tuesday's presidential election believe American democracy is under threat, according to national exit poll data from Edison Research
summary: Nearly three-quarters of voters in Tuesday's presidential election believe American democracy is under threat, according to national exit poll data from Edison Research

title: "If History Any Indicator...": Tim Walz On Trump Accepting Election Results
content: Minnesota Governor Tim Walz, the running mate of Vice President Kamala Harris, expressed optimism that former President Donald Trump will accept the election results even if he loses, CNN reported.
summary: Minnesota Governor Tim Walz, the running mate of Vice President Kamala Harris, expressed optimism that former President Donald Trump will accept the election results even if he loses, CNN reported.

title: Fake Bomb Threats Linked To Russia Briefly Close Georgia Polling Locations
content: At least two polling sites in the US election battleground state of Georgia were briefly evacuated on Tuesday after fake bomb threats that election officials in the state blamed on Russian agents.
summary: At least two polling sites in the US election battleground state of Georgia were briefly evacuated on Tuesday after fake bomb threats that election officials in the state blamed on Russian agents.

title: FBI Warns Of Bomb Threats From Russia At US Voting Sites
content: The FBI warned of bomb threats at polling stations in "multiple" US states on Election Day, adding that none were credible but many appeared to originate from Russia.
summary: The FBI warned of bomb threats at polling stations in "multiple" US states on Election Day, adding that none were credible but many appeared to originate from Russia.

title: Donald Trump vs Kamala Harris: Who Is Winning The US Election Right Now?
content: Polling aggregator FiveThirtyEight has named Kamala Harris as its favourite to win, switching from Donald Trump.
summary: Polling aggregator FiveThirtyEight has named Kamala Harris as its favourite to win, switching from Donald Trump.

title: Track Live US Election Updates On Your iPhone Lock Screen. Here's How
content: As Americans begin to cast their ballots to elect their next president, Apple News will bring live updates to iPhone and iPad users' lock screens.
summary: As Americans begin to cast their ballots to elect their next president, Apple News will bring live updates to iPhone and iPad users' lock screens.

title: Netanyahu Fires Defence Minister Yoav Gallant Amid Middle East Conflict
content: Israel's Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Tuesday dismissed Defence Minister Yoav Gallant over a breakdown in trust during the Gaza war against Hamas, his office said.
summary: Israel's Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Tuesday dismissed Defence Minister Yoav Gallant over a breakdown in trust during the Gaza war against Hamas, his office said.

title: Amid Inflation, Rising Fuel Prices, Voters Head To Las Vegas Polls
content: Inflation, the cost of gasoline and food, rising rents: for Las Vegas voters heading to the polls on Tuesday to choose between Donald Trump and Kamala Harris, the cost of living was paramount.
summary: Inflation, the cost of gasoline and food, rising rents: for Las Vegas voters heading to the polls on Tuesday to choose between Donald Trump and Kamala Harris, the cost of living was paramount.

title: Harris vs Trump - America Elects 47th US President. Election Result Today
content: The wait to know who will win - Kamala Harris or Donald Trump - is nearly over. Americans have decided who their next President will be.
summary: The wait to know who will win - Kamala Harris or Donald Trump - is nearly over. Americans have decided who their next President will be.

title: Palestinians In Gaza Hope New US President Calls An End To War
content: Palestinians in war-ravaged Gaza told AFP on Tuesday that whoever emerges victorious in the US presidential election must end the conflict in the territory, which has taken an appalling human toll.
summary: Palestinians in war-ravaged Gaza told AFP on Tuesday that whoever emerges victorious in the US presidential election must end the conflict in the territory, which has taken an appalling human toll.

title: Kamala Harris Urges Americans To "Get Out And Vote" On Election Day
content: Kamala Harris urged Americans to "get out and vote" on Election Day, particularly in battleground states, as her White House duel with Donald Trump reached its climax Tuesday.
summary: Kamala Harris urged Americans to "get out and vote" on Election Day, particularly in battleground states, as her White House duel with Donald Trump reached its climax Tuesday.

title: Trump Says He Would Concede Defeat "If It's A Fair Election"
content: Donald Trump feels "very confident" about winning back the White House, the Republican said Tuesday after casting his Election Day ballot in Florida in one of the most contentious US elections in decades.
summary: Donald Trump feels "very confident" about winning back the White House, the Republican said Tuesday after casting his Election Day ballot in Florida in one of the most contentious US elections in decades.

title: How The Cold Sore Virus Can Reach And Infect Your Brain
content: The virus affects critical brain regions tied to sleep, mood, and hormonal control, potentially linking HSV-1 to neurodegenerative diseases.
summary: The virus affects critical brain regions tied to sleep, mood, and hormonal control, potentially linking HSV-1 to neurodegenerative diseases.
